text.string: If you see this text, please contact the devs
Right click for options, double click for details.
Right-click to see al available actions
This project takes a lot of time.

language.text: Laat ons weten wat je vindt!
Geef feedback door hier te klikken

text.string: You might need to restart the GUI, in order for
these settings to take full eff

Select where the config files of the GUI should be stored. Appdata means that, no matter where you put the executable, the same settings will be used. Recommended. Local means that the config files will be stored in the same folder as the GUI. This is needed to run multiple GUI instances at one computer.
Start the server when the GUI starts, using the settings from the SuperStart tab.
Toggle the GUI start when the user logs on. Administrator privileges required.
Set the language for the GUI.
Play a sound when the server sends a severe message
Play a sound when the server sends a warning
Play a sound when a player leaves the server
Play a sound when a player connects to the server
Show a tray balloon when the server throws a warning message
Show a tray balloon when a player leaves.
Show a tray balloon when a player joins.
Show a tray balloon when the server throws a severe message
Minimize the GUI to tray when the minimize button is clicked.
The font size that will be used for most lists and textboxes.
The font type that will be used for most lists an textboxes.
Right-click to see al available actions.
Double click for more information. Right Click for options.
The server settings you entered are invalid Please enter valid settings and try again
An update is available. If you continue, this update will be installed automaticly.
Note: if the server is running, it will be stopped while updating
Run this task when the server starts.
Run this task when the server stops.
Run this task every hh:mm:ss while the server is running.
Run this task when the computer time is equal to hh:mm:ss.
Run this task every time a player joins the server.
Run this task every time a playerdisconnects.
Run this task when a player disconnects and there are no longer players online.
Run this task when the server doesn't respond any longer. This task will send a heartbeat to the server, and check if the server responds
The amount of time between 2 heartbeats, in hh:mm:ss
Run a program, or a file that is associated with a default program.
the path to the program or file
Send a command to the server, if the server is running.
Stop the server, if it's running.
Start the server, if it isn't already running. No parameters required.
The server will start with the settings set in the superstart tab.
Restart the server, if it's running. No parameters required.
Restart a server that doesn't respond, by killing it and starting it again. Might cause data loss. USE WITH CAUTION.
Sycnhronize the GUI player list with the server player list
Create a backup. The backup settings as set in options and info will be used.
The name of the task. Doesn't affect the working of the task.
Explanation: Please select a type first
The trigger parameters. Provide settings for the trigger here, if needed.
The name must be at least 1 character long
The java path could not be found, server start aborted
It seems that the server stopped responding. Do you want to kill the server?
Error while loading plugins. Internet available?

The application encountered some problems. Please help us fixing these problems, by sending an anonymous log.
If you want to be contacted or informed about this issue, you can provide your e-mail below. If you have additional details or information, you can write it below. Note: Both fields are optional. You can also just send the log.

language.text:
De aplicatie heeft een probleem ondervonden. Help ons a.u.b. om deze op te lossen, door een anoniem logbestand op te sturen
Als je hierover verder gecontacteerd wilt worden, kan je je email adres invullen. Als je extra informatie hebt, kan je deze in het commentaar veld schrijven. Beide velden zijn optioneel, je bent dus niet verplicht om iets in te vullend

text.string: Invalid file path, must be a .jar file
Compress backup to reduce disk usage.
You need to specify at least 1 directory
You need to specify the destination directory
Create a backup. Enter the name of the backup to execute.
You need to enter a backup name
You need to enter a valid backup name
Failed to connect to remote server. Are the credentials correct?
Do you really want to kill the server? This can corrupt your data!
Can't send bug report: no internet available
Restart the GUI for the changes to take effect
You must enter a path to the .jar file
Right-click to see all available actions
This bug report can't be submitted automaticly: program outdated.
Please make sure you have the latest version
If you want to report this error manually, you can contact us at
The log has been uploaded. Thank you for sending it towards us!
You can keep this for future reference.
Error while importing the Backup! Is this a valid file?

language.text: Fout tijdens het importeren van de backup. Is dit bestand correct?
Fout tijdens het exporten van de backup!
Fout tijdens het exporteren van de backups!

text.string: Reason: Nothing selected to backup. Select folders first.

language.text: Reden: niets geselecteerd voor backup. Selecteer eerst mappen om te backuppen.

text.string: Could not get data for this plugin

language.text: Kan geen gegevens laden voor deze plugin

text.string: Error: No downloads are available for this project. It is probably still under construction.

language.text: Fout: Er zijn geen downloads beschikbaar voor dit project. Vermoedlijk wordt er nog aan gewerkt.

text.string: An error occured while loading this data

language.text: Er ging iets mis tijdens het laden van de gegevens.

text.string: The file you chose to download is not supported yet.

language.text: Het bestand dat je koos om te downloaden is nog niet ondersteund.

text.string: At this moment only .jar and .zip files are supported.

language.text: Op dit moment zijn enkel .jar en .zip bestanden ondersteund

text.string: couldn't be installed. You have to visit the project page in order to install it manually.

language.text: kon niet worden geïnstalleerd. Bezoek de project pagina om het bestand zelf te downloaden/installeren.

text.string: A restart is required in order for the changes to take effect. The GUI will now close itself

language.text: Een herstart is nodig om de veranderingen door te voeren. De GUI zal zichzelf nu sluiten.

text.string: You can only use the following characters: a-z ; 1-9 ; _ ; -

language.text: Je kan enkel volgende karakters gebruiken: a-z ; 1-9 ; _ ; -
Je kan geen lege berichten verzenden!

text.string: No data for this plugin available

language.text: geen gegevens voor deze plugin beschikbaar

text.string: Could not load plugin data for this plugin

language.text: Gegevens voor deze plugin konden niet geladen worden

text.string: I have read and accept the

language.text: Ik verklaar dit te hebben gelezen en te accepteren:

text.string: Time should be in format hh:mm:ss

language.text: Tijd moet volgens formaat uu:mm:ss ingevoerd worden

text.string: You need to enter a command
You need to enter a file or program

language.text: Je moet een bestand of programma ingeven.

text.string: You didn't enter valid values. Make sure all values are valid, and try again

language.text: Je gaf geen geldige waarden op. Verzeker je ervan dat alle waarden juist zijn, en probeer opnieuw.

text.string: Could not get ticket ID, upload cancelled. If you want to report this error manually, you can contact us at

language.text: Ticket ID kon niet opgehaald worden. Als je deze bug handmatig wilt rapporteren, contacteer ons dan via

text.string: Error while importing the task! Is this a valid file?

language.text: Fout tijdens het importeren van deze taak. Is het bestand correct?
Fout tijdens het exporteren van de taak!
Fout tijdens het exporteren van de taken!

text.string: You have to accept in order to use the application. Do you want to exit?

language.text: Je moet de licentie accepteren om het programma te kunnen gebruiken. Sluiten?

text.string: You need to stop the server in order to remove this plugin. Stop server?

language.text: De server moet gestopt worden om deze plugin te verwijderen. Nu stoppen?

text.string: It seems that this folder was created by the plugin:

language.text: Het lijkt erop dat deze map gemaakt werd door deze plugin:

text.string: Plugin removal failed. There might be some files left undeleted

language.text: Plugin verwijdering mislukt. Sommige bestanden zijn niet verwijderd;

text.string: Please select the correct java version in the superstart tab

language.text: Selecteer a.u.b. de correcte java versie in de superstart tab.

text.string: Could not start the process - no executable given

language.text: Het proces kon niet gestart worden - geen uitvoerbaar bestand opgegeven.

text.string: The program couldn't find this executable:

language.text: Het programma kon dit bestand niet vinden:

text.string: The server should be running before you can send commands.

language.text: De server moet aan staan voor je commandos kan sturen.

text.string: The command could not be sent due to an error. See the log file for more information

language.text: Het commando kon niet verzonden worden wegens een fout. Zie het logbestand voor meer info.

text.string: The GUI couldn't download data from

language.text: De GUI kon geen data downloaden van

text.string: Killed remote server connection, severe error in remote reader thread. Please report this bug.

language.text: Remote server verbinding afgesloten, ernstige fout in remote reader thread. Rapporteer deze fout a.u.b.

text.string: The server settings you entered are invalid

language.text: De ingevoerde server instellingen zijn ongeldig

text.string: You can't use more then 1024MB RAM with Java x32

language.text: Je kan niet meer dan 1024MB RAM toewijzen als je een 32bits java versie gebruikt.

text.string: Autostart is currently disabled. Do you want to enable autostart?

language.text: Autostart is nu uitgeschakeld. Wil je het inschakelen?

text.string: Autostart is currently enabled. Do you want to disable autostart?

language.text: Autostart is nu ingeschakeld. Wil je het uitschakelen?

text.string: Can't access autostart functions! Are you running this as administrator?

language.text: Geen toegang tot autostart functies. Voer het programma uit als administrator.

text.string: The following xml file could not be loaded. Please check for errors

language.text: Het volgende XML bestand kon niet worden geladen, kijk na op fouten.

text.string: Oh no! something went wrong in the application. The application is unable to continue it's work, and will exit. Please report this error to the developers

language.text: Er ging iets mis in het programma. Het programma kan niet verdergaan, en zal afsluiten. Rapporteer dit probleem a.u.b. aan de ontwikkelaars.

text.string: This file is too big to send using the error report. If you want to report it, please upload %appdata%/Bertware/BukkitGUI/Logging/BukkitGUI.xlog and send it to contact@bertware.net

language.text: Dit bestand is te groot om te verzenden via fout rapportage. Als je het manueel wil rapporteren, upload dan %appdata%/Bertware/BukkitGUI/Logging/BukkitGUI.xlog en stuur een link naar contact@bertware.net

text.string: Update information invalid: server returned error

language.text: Van deze map kon geen backup gemaakt worden:

text.string: Run this task before the server starts.

language.text: Voer deze taak uit voor de server start

text.string: Run this task before the server stops.

language.text: Voer deze taak uit voor de server stopt

text.string: The time in hh:mm:ss. You can add multiple times, each in hh:mm:ss format, split by ;

language.text: De tijd in hh:mm:ss. Je kan meerdere tijden opgeven, in hh:mm:ss formaat, gesplitst door ;

text.string: Optional: the player name(s) to trigger at, split by;

language.text: Optioneel: De namen waarbij de trigger geactiveerd word, gesplitst door ;. Laat leeg om op alle namen te activeren.

text.string: Run this task every time a player disconnects.

language.text: Uitvoeren wanneer een speler de server verlaat

text.string: Optional: the player name(s) to trigger at, split by ;

language.text: Optioneel: De namen waarbij de trigger geactiveerd word, gesplitst door ;. Laat leeg om op alle namen te activeren.

text.string: the command to send. You can specify multiple commands, separated by ;

language.text: Het te sturen commando. Je kan meerdere commando's ingeven, gesplitst door ;

text.string: An update is available. If you continue, this update will be installed automaticl

language.text: Een update is beschikbaar, deze zal automatisch geinstalleerd worden

text.string: Access to to the following folder was denied.

language.text: Toegang tot deze map was geweigerd.

text.string: Please run this app as administrator to ensure proper working

language.text: Gelieve het programma met administratorrechten uit te voeren om een correcte werking te garanderen.

text.string: The server didn't respond in time

language.text: De server reageerde niet op tijd, verbinding afgebroken.

text.string: The server didn't response in time

language.text: De server reageerde niet op tijd, verbinding afgebroken.

text.string: The server is still running. Do you want to stop the server and exit the GUI?

language.text: De Minecraft server staat nog aan. Server stoppen en GUI sluiten?

text.string: The server could not be started: the .jar file specified could not be found. Please make sure all superstart settings are valid.

language.text: De server kon niet gestart worden, .jar bestand niet gevonden. Controleer alle instellingen in superstart.

text.string: The server could not be started, reason:

language.text: Server kon niet gestart worden, reden:

text.string: This is probably caused by another server that is running already.

language.text: Dit is vermoedelijk veroorzaakt door een andere server instantie.

text.string: Kill all java instances, and retry to start this server?

language.text: Alle java processen sluiten, en server herstarten?

text.string: Your current bukkit version could not be determined

language.text: Huidige bukkit versie kon niet bepaald worden

text.string: Error while loading plugins. Probably the server could not be reached.

language.text: Plugins konden niet geladen worden, vermoedelijk is de webserver niet beschikbaar.

text.string: Do you really want to reset all GUI settings?

language.text: Weet je zeker dat je alle instellingen wilt resetten?

text.string: All settings will be resetted. You need to restart the GUI in order for the changes to take effect

language.text: Alle instellingen zullen gerest worden. Herstart de GUI om wijzigingen toe te passen.

text.string: One of your backup profiles wasn't loaded: the file is probably corrupt! The backup profile was removed.

language.text: One of your backup profiles wasn't loaded: the file is probably corrupt! The backup profile was removed.

text.string: The backup can't be performed: the following drive could not be found. Is this a removeable device (e.g. USB stick)

language.text: The backup can't be performed: the following drive could not be found. Is this a removeable device (e.g. USB stick)

text.string: An error occured while creating a backup for the following backup scheme:

language.text: An error occured while creating a backup for the following backup scheme:

text.string: The backup might be incomplete or corrupt. Make sure all task settings are valid. The error has been logged

language.text: The backup might be incomplete or corrupt. Make sure all task settings are valid. The error has been logged

text.string: The current bukkit version could not be determined. It seems like you don't have permissions to do this. Try running the GUI as administator

language.text: The current bukkit version could not be determined. It seems like you don't have permissions to do this. Try running the GUI as administator

text.string: Please write your feedback in English.

language.text: Please write your feedback in English.

text.string: The downloaded file could not be saved. Are you allowed to write to this location? Try running as administrator

language.text: The downloaded file could not be saved. Are you allowed to write to this location? Try running as administrator

text.string: You will now be redirected to a 3rd party website that is not owned by Bertware.

language.text: You will now be redirected to a 3rd party website that is not owned by Bertware.

text.string: Force update if already up to date

language.text: Force update if already up to date

text.string: Run this task when another task finished. You can set an optional timeout.

language.text: Run this task when another task finished. You can set an optional timeout.

text.string: the name of the task. You can add a timeout, by adding the time in /hh:mm:ss format after the task name.

language.text: the name of the task. You can add a timeout, by adding the time in /hh:mm:ss format after the task name.

text.string: Run this task when certain text is received from the server. Warning! this might be CPU intensive!

language.text: Run this task when certain text is received from the server. Warning! this might be CPU intensive!

text.string: the text that will trigger this. Note: if this text is CONTAINED in the server text, the event will run.

language.text: the text that will trigger this. Note: if this text is CONTAINED in the server text, the event will run.

text.string: Kick all the players that are online.

language.text: Kick all the players that are online.

text.string: Optional: the reason for kicking them. (if you have a plugin that supports kick reasons)

language.text: Optional: the reason for kicking them. (if you have a plugin that supports kick reasons)

text.string: The taskmanager couldn't execute this task:

language.text: The taskmanager couldn't execute this task:

text.string: Couldn't get the backup settings for backup scheme

language.text: Couldn't get the backup settings for backup scheme

text.string: The server could not be started. It seems like you don't have permissions to access needed files. Try running the GUI as administator

language.text: The server could not be started. It seems like you don't have permissions to access needed files. Try running the GUI as administator

text.string: The server could not be started. It seems like you don't have permissions to do this. Try running the GUI as administator

language.text: The server could not be started. It seems like you don't have permissions to do this. Try running the GUI as administator

language.text: WARNING: No craftbukkit file selected, bukkit version can't be determined. Auto update check cancelled.

text.string: WARNING: or make sure the .jar file contains bukkit

language.text: WARNING: or make sure the .jar file contains bukkit

language.text: Your current bukkit version couldn't be determined

language.text: A new bukkit version is available:

language.text: A new version for bukkit is available:

language.text: Bukkit was updated to the latest version:

language.text: Killed remote server connection due to an error in remote reader thread.

text.string: You can right click and try refreshing.

language.text: You can right click and try refreshing.

text.string: If you selected a category, it's possible that this category is empty.

language.text: If you selected a category, it's possible that this category is empty.

text.string: Right click for options, double click for details. Ctrl+click or Shift+click to select multiple items.

language.text: Right click for options, double click for details. Ctrl+click or Shift+click to select multiple items.

text.string: These changes will take effect the next time you start the GUI

language.text: These changes will take effect the next time you start the GUI

text.string: This file is too big to send using the error report. If you want to report it, please upload %appdata%/Bertware/BukkitGUI/Logging/BukkitGUI.log and send it to contact@bertware.net
